articles.title: In virus outbreak, fretting over a name that might go viral
articles.description: Health officials hope to avoid stigma and error in naming the virus behind the outbreak of respiratory illnesses that started in China late last year
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
West Nile virus, Lyme disease, Ebola virus. 
And now: 2019 nCoV?
Just rolls off the tongue, doesn't it? said Trevor Hoppe, a researcher at the University of North Carolina at Greensboro, who has studied the history of disease names.
